short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book-up on anything with Abbey, by US AI. Use our Chrome Extension to easily import webpages into Abbey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Abbey extension is an extension is our website. It allows you to easily bring webpages or videos into Abbey and interact with them using a LLM. Abbey is excellent for researchers, professionals, or anyone looking to learn new things.
